titleStmt.title: William T. Samuels to James R. Page
CWG1883

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Auditor's Office, Kentucky.
WILLIAM T. SAMUELS,
Attorney at Law & General Collecting Agent,
FRANKFORT, KY.
&#9758Special attantion given to the collection of all claims confided to him throughout the State of Kentucky.
WILLIAM T. SAMUELS, Auditor.
EDGAR KEENON, Ass't Auditor.
James M. Withrow, Clerk.
Uberto Kennon, Clerk.
R. R. Bacon, Clerk.
John A. Crittenden, Clerk.
Jno. W. Pruett, Jr., Clerk.
Charles T. Miller, Clerk.
John L. Sneed, Clerk.

Frankfort, Ky., 11 May, 1864.
Jas R Page Eq.
Asst Secy.
Dear Sir
My Cousin Alexander Sayers Sayers Samuels Depot Nelson Co Ky. desires a Commission as Notary Public.
Please send Claim Commission to Samuels Depot. Nelson Co Ky. I advise him of your fee & request him to remit by mail & he will do so

Nelson Co
Notary Public
apptd
11th May 1864
